attributes.action: Petition to Close RETHINK 84-85 Marston Road Stafford
attributes.additional_details: Action to be taken to close Down RETHINK Centre 84-85 Marston Road Stafford. Due to Lack of Hygiene , using communal areas as a toilet. Antisocial Behaviour , Alcohol and Drug Abuse. Indecent Exposure around Children, sign this petition today so our children don't have to be exposed to this on a daily basis, We want better for our children and ourselves. Please Help us !
